conclusion: Preliminary objection dismissed (struck out of the list);Remainder inadmissible;Violation of Art. 3 (substantive aspect);Violation of Art. 13;Pecuniary damage - claim dismissed;Non-pecuniary damage - award
externalsources: Report of the European Committee for the Prevention of Torture and Inhuman and Degrading Treatment or Punishment (“CPT”) concerning the visit to Latvia between 25 September and 4 October 2002
judges: Alvina Gyulumyan;Elisabet Fura;Ineta Ziemele;Josep Casadevall;Luis López Guerra
